Title: Gearing Up for Trouble
Description:
Stonehead's got a clunker, busted and all. Needs a fixin', yeah?

You get to tinkerin', help mend up that machine. 

Have good trade for a job well done, yes? Off you go, friend!
ObjectivesText: Complete 20  waves of the Awakening the Machine event.
CompletionText: Done tinkerin' with that clunker yet? Machine all hummin' and happy, yeah?
RewardText:
Ah, all fixed up, shiny and smooth! Here's your shiny bit, good work done. 

Now, let's swap some goods, yes?

Objectives.Text: Speak with Speaker Kuldas to begin Awakening the Machine
